name: AVOID (itch) (Lastnight0)
description:
Hey everyone, I present to you AVOID, it's a top-down kinda bullet-hell but with all kind of obstacles that you as a little green square have to get through. It features 40 levels, the progress is saved by the browser so you can play it whenever you want. It's also open-source! You can find my github page here!

Hope you have fun <3
